settings.title: Gem sourcing + anti-slavery statement
settings.text: The diamond industry has in the past been associated with conflict and exploitation, the industry has taken a number of pro-active steps to combat this, most notably in the form of the Kimberley Process (which certifies that diamonds originate from conflict free zones). Through our procurement and polishing division we are subject to rigorous requirements which set out the detailed standards that our procurement and polishing division is required to adhere to in order to maintain its status. Among other requirements there is a focus on supply chain management, provenance claims, child and forced labour and ethical standards generally.
Find what you seek.

settings.title: Heading
settings.text: Text area can be used for details about blog authors or general information.

settings.title: Return Policy
settings.text: If for any reason you are not completely satisfied with your purchase, you return your item(s) within 30 days of purchase. There are no returns or exchanges on final sale (sample sale) merchandise. Returns will be processed within 3 to 5 business days of receipt of your item(s). You will be receive an email notification once your return is processed. Please note that payment processing is beyond our control and it may take up to 3-5 additional business days for the funds to be credited to your account.

settings.title: Have you explored out new timepiece models yet?

settings.newsletter_text: To keep our team and community safe, all made to order items will take longer than normal to ship out. We're offering 20% off our in stock collection with the code TOGETHER20.

settings.title: Timeless and luxurious, available now in-store and online
The long and winding road
settings.text: As long as we can remember, we've always been drawn to simplicity, beautiful designs and creating things. Our collections always draw inspiration from this, and the natural beauty in this world. We both come from a design-focused background; jewelry and accessories were always just a hobby. Once we knew that this is what we were passionate about, we realized that this is what we would dedicate our lives to – and we wanted to share it with the world. After several years of hard-work, our dream became a reality and we were able to finally put ourselves and our company out there. Our pieces are meant to be unique and timeless, something that you'll never want to take off and that you can wear your whole life.
What makes us different

settings.newsletter_richtext: Sign up to get the latest on sales, new releases and more …

settings.text: We use cookies on our website to give you the best shopping experience. By using this site, you agree to its use of cookies.

settings.title: How can I track my order?
settings.answer: All orders are dispatched within 48 hours upon your purchase. Once dispatched, you will receive a shipping confirmation with a tracking link embedded on.

settings.title: Which countries do we ship to?
settings.answer:
We currently only ship to the United States.

Shipping cost and delivery times:

Shipping cost $5.00 and free above $50 minimum spend.

Delivery time ranges from 6-10 working days.

settings.title: What is your cancellation and return policy?
settings.answer:
Cancellation:
An order may only be cancelled if it has not been shipped. Fill up the contact form for cancellation request.


Returns:
As jewerly is a personal item, we only accept returns in the event when the item you received is defective and/or incorrectly shipped.

Exchange:
As jewerly is a personal item, we only accept exchanges if the item is unopened from the cling wrap. Exchange shipment cost will be borne by the customers.

settings.title: How do I return an item?
settings.answer:
Fill up the return form and send in the form via our contact form to us.

Returns cost will be reimburse to you in the event of defective and incorrect item shipped.

settings.title: When will I receive my refund ?
settings.answer: We will process the refund request within 2 business day upon receiving the request. It may take up to 14 business days for the money to reach your bank.

settings.title: How do I take care of my jewerly?
settings.answer:
We recommend taking off your jewelry before going to bed, showering, or taking part in any physical activity to maintain its shine.

To clean your jewerly, purchase a jewerly cleansing gel and a soft jewrly care cloth, gently polish it to get the perfect shine.

settings.title: Are your gems and materials sourced responsibly?

settings.answer: Provide the answer to the question here.

settings.title: What payment options do you accept?
settings.answer: We accept all major credit cards, PayPal and Apple Pay.

settings.title: Will I be charged duties & taxes?
settings.answer: Duties and Taxes charged will depend on the state you are located in.
